description:
Over 100 students enrolled in just 3 first days!
And over 200 -- in first 5 days!

Within this course, we will provide you with a set of instruments and solutions that were developed by the world’s best management and leadership professionals, successful CEOs and business owners as well as training and psychology gurus like David Allen, Alistair Cockburn, Patrick Lencioni, Michael Litvak, David Kolb, Steve Pavlina, Allan Pease, Henry Mintzberg, Carl Fillip Gottlib von Clausewitz, Ichak Adizes and many others!

We also added our own experience, accumulated for almost 15 years while working in and with international companies, leading teams, managing resources, projects, products as well as visiting conferences and communicating with our own trainings’ attendees.

These instruments and solutions DO WORK! That’s been proven by the millions of people around the globe who’ve used them, as well as by the thousands of people who have visited our onsite and online training sessions.

If you perform the tasks detailed in the course, follow our instructions and stick to our recommendations at work for least 3-4 months, you will significantly increase your personal level as a manager and leader.

The course consists of 14 sections and 37 lectures. Each section covers a particular set of skills each and every manager and leader should master.

The Video part you will cover in 10 hours.

The Homework part may take you from several weeks to months to fully complete.

______________________________________________________________________

Pricing: $99 is an introductory price.

It is about to change to $199 and later even to $399.

So take your chance to enroll for this super attractive price before time runs out!
______________________________________________________________________
title: Build Your Career And Be A Terrific Manager
